div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1277 Cyprus, 1934-5 Burial: c. 425-400 B.C. (M) Contents: 11 AR Thasos: 1 fr. (as Traité II.4, nos. 1152 ff.) Lycia, Kheriga: 1 fr. (cf. Traité II.2, no. 371) Idalium: 2 fr. (BMC 4-5) Lapethus: 1 st. (BMC 3) Paphus: 3 st. (BMC 4-5) Salamis: 2 st. (BMC 1 and 12) Unc. Cypriote mint: 1 st. (cf. NC 1935, p. 174, nos. 536 ff.) Disposition: dispersed Information from H. Seyrig
